member.name: ISyncMgrControl.ActivateHandler
member.param: TRUE to activate; FALSE to deactivate.
A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A handle to a window that can be used by the handler to display any necessary UI. This value can be NULL.
A value from the enumeration specifying whether the activation or deactivation of the handler should be performed synchronously or asynchronously.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.EnableHandler
member.param: TRUE to enable; FALSE to disable.
A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A handle to a window that can be used by the handler to display any necessary UI. This value can be NULL.
A value from the enumeration specifying whether the enabling or disabling of the handler should be performed synchronously or asynchronously.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.EnableItem
member.summary: Enables or disables a sync item managed by a specified handler.
member.param: TRUE to enable; FALSE to disable.
A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the item. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A handle to a window that can be used by the item to display any necessary UI. This value can be NULL.
A value from the enumeration specifying whether the enabling or disabling of the item should be performed synchronously or asynchronously.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.StartHandlerSync
member.summary: Initiates the synchronization of all items managed by a particular handler.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler to synchronize. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A handle to the window that the handler can use to display any necessary UI. This value can be NULL.
A pointer to an to be passed to . This parameter can be NULL.
A member of the enumeration that specifies whether an item found in both a current sync and a queued sync should be synchronized again when the queued sync is performed.

A pointer to an instance of , whose method is called when the synchronization ends, either through success, failure, or cancellation. The Result method is called with the aggregated state of the handler synchronization. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.StartItemSync
member.summary: Initiates the synchronization of specified items managed by a particular handler.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler that manages the items. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.

The address of a pointer to a buffer containing an array of IDs of the items to be synchronized. Each ID is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character. This array is passed to .
The number of IDs in ppszItemIDs.
A handle to the window that the item can use to display any necessary UI. This value can be NULL.
A pointer to an to be passed to . This parameter can be NULL.
A member of the enumeration that specifies whether an item found in both a current sync and a queued sync should be synchronized again when the queued sync is performed.

A pointer to an instance of , whose method is called when the synchronization ends, either through success, failure, or cancellation. The Result method is called with the aggregated state of the handler synchronization. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.StartSyncAll
member.summary: Synchronizes all items managed by all handlers.
member.param: A handle to a window that can be used by a handler or item to display any necessary UI. This value can be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.StopHandlerSync
member.summary: Stops the synchronization of a specified handler.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.StopItemSync
member.summary: Stops the synchronization of specified items managed by a particular handler.
member.param: a pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
The address of a pointer to a buffer containing an array of IDs of the items to stop synchronizing. Each ID is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
The number of IDs in ppszItemIDs.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.StopSyncAll
member.summary: Stops the synchronization of all items managed by all handlers.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.UpdateConflicts
member.summary: Informs Sync Center that conflicts have been added for a specific handler or item.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler that manages the item. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.

A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the item. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character. This parameter can be NULL if the event occurred on the handler rather than on a specific item.
A value from the enumeration specifying whether the update should be performed synchronously or asynchronously.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.UpdateEvents
member.summary: Informs Sync Center that events have been added for a specific handler or item.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler that manages the item. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.

A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the item. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character. This parameter can be NULL if the event occurred on the handler rather than on a specific item.
A value from the enumeration specifying whether the update should be performed synchronously or asynchronously.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.UpdateHandler
member.summary: Instructs Sync Center to reenumerate the items managed by a handler or informs it that properties of the handler have changed.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A value from the enumeration specifying whether the update should be performed synchronously or asynchronously.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.UpdateHandlerCollection
member.summary: Instructs Sync Center to reenumerate the handler collection, or informs it that properties of a handler in the handler collection have changed.
member.param: A reference to the handler collection's CLSID.
A value from the enumeration specifying whether the update should be performed synchronously or asynchronously.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl.UpdateItem
member.summary: Informs Sync Center that properties of a sync item have changed.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler that manages the item. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the item. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A value from the enumeration specifying whether the update should be performed synchronously or asynchronously.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrControl
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow an application or handler to start or stop a synchronization, notify Sync Center of changes to the set of handlers or items, or notify of changes to property values.
